argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnfvalfi.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | psgnfvalfi.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | psgnfvalfi.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 4 |  | psgnfvalfi.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ P e. B ) -> P e. B ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_sygbasnfpfi | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ P e. B ) -> dom ( P \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_psgneldm | |- ( P e. dom N <-> ( P e. B /\ dom ( P \ _I ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ P e. B ) -> P e. dom N ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_psgnval | |- ( P e. dom N -> ( N ` P ) = ( iota s E. w e. Word T ( P = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ P e. B ) -> ( N ` P ) = ( iota s E. w e. Word T ( P = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) ) |
